titles.title: A resolution designating each of Saturday, November 7, 2009, and Saturday, November 6, 2010, as "National Wounded Warrior Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 11/4/2009--Introduced. Designates each of November 7, 2009, and November 6, 2010, as National Wounded Warrior Day. Encourages the United States to honor our wounded warriors who have sacrificed their safety in order to preserve our freedom.
